name: TheCyberWireFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get your daily summary of cyber security news in just two minutes from the CyberWire. Updated daily, Monday through Friday around 12pm EST.

Add the CyberWire to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news using the Settings in your Alexa app. Then you can say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news?" to hear your CyberWire Daily Briefing.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
